Since moving down one space will bring the avatar closer to a diamond while still avoiding enemies, I will act accordingly to collect that resource.

Thus, I will proceed with the following action:

``` Action: 4 ```
This downward move is expected to bring me closer to the diamond at (2, 22), aligning with the strategy of collecting diamonds efficiently without confrontation.
